text: Hagi tamagri ha' vahe'mo'za amanahu hu'naze, mago ventemofoma amu'nompi zafamo oti fatgo osu'negeno selima anaki nofitamimo'a ru kreko vako nehigeno selia ruta oreankna hu'naze. E'ina hu'nazankita tamagra vuta feno zazamia ome refko huta enerisnage'za, zamagia keni zamaza keni vahe'mo'za henka vu'za ome kesnazana mago'a fenozana me'nesnige'za zamagranena eri'za vugahaze.
